Articles.Content: Hi Linux. i have a frustrating problem with the mod. the mod itself works like it should be. but the countdown sounds are cut of after each second witch is really not nice to listen to. maybe you know how to fix it? help would be much appreciated. i can make a video of it if you want and post a link here

3 hours ago, MrLaunchpad said:

Hi Linux. i have a frustrating problem with the mod. the mod itself works like it should be. but the countdown sounds are cut of after each second witch is really not nice to listen to. maybe you know how to fix it? help would be much appreciated. i can make a video of it if you want and post a link here

Depends on the sound files, whch soundtrack are you using?
Well it happend with all the apollo soundtracks, the delta II soundtrack and the STS soundtracks. Those were the ones i tested befor writing my post.

7 minutes ago, MrLaunchpad said:

Well it happend with all the apollo soundtracks, the delta II soundtrack and the STS soundtracks. Those were the ones i tested befor writing my post.

Just tested out all the soundtracks and only falcon9, freedom7,  liberty bell7, longMarch &  longmarch 2F, OrbiterOne and skylab work more or less as intended. The sound still cuts out when the numbers on the countdown change.

13 hours ago, MrLaunchpad said:

Just tested out all the soundtracks and only falcon9, freedom7,  liberty bell7, longMarch &  longmarch 2F, OrbiterOne and skylab work more or less as intended. The sound still cuts out when the numbers on the countdown change. 

If you drill down into the directory for this, you can find the ogg files used.  Try playing them, most likely they are just clipped sound files
Hi its me again. It seems that this mod does not work with Gravity turn anymore. When i launch with this mod gravity turn does nothing and my rocket just goes straight up. I hope you can help me.

4 hours ago, MrLaunchpad said:

Hi its me again. It seems that this mod does not work with Gravity turn anymore. When i launch with this mod gravity turn does nothing and my rocket just goes straight up. I hope you can help me.

No logs, no support

On 2/4/2023 at 1:25 PM, MrLaunchpad said:

Well it happend with all the apollo soundtracks, the delta II soundtrack and the STS soundtracks. Those were the ones i tested befor writing my post.

Greetings,
I know this thread is a bit old, but for the sake of anyone else with a similar issue, I find that if your frame rate is less than 50 - 60FPS or so, this issue is much more pronounced.
excuse me in an update maybe you could add the starship IFT launch audio
I have a glitch on mac none of the noises play but the clock goes

8 hours ago, ksp guy14 said:

I have a glitch on mac none of the noises play but the clock goes

Does this mod still work with the current version of the game?  I’m a bit new so I’m just wondering. I’m looking for a countdown timer since I miss having one from ksp2

18 hours ago, HammerTyme said:

Does this mod still work with the current version of the game?  I’m a bit new so I’m just wondering. I’m looking for a countdown timer since I miss having one from ksp2

yes, it does
